name: Project MBDK ultra
description:
Project MDBK ultra is a 2d puzzle game, where players take control of Lekina, a girl able to control objects with his mind, but, when she uses his power, she fall as sleep, she was invited to participate on project MBDK ultra, that is researching superhuman habilites, like Lekina ones.

Controls

WASD keys - Movement 

Arrow Keys - Telekinesis Target

Space key - Stop Telekinesis
